#id=1
#text=While I was out riding my bike one warm spring day , one of the tires went flat .
#id=2
#text=Fortunately I had a repair kit with me in a pouch on the bike .
#id=3
#text=I always kept it with me on rides just in case of such an occurrence .
#id=4
#text=I got off and went to the side of the trail out of the way of other bikers and runners .
#id=5
#text=I lay the bike on its side and got the repair kit out of the pouch .
#id=6
#text=The repair kit contained a new inner tube which I inflated .
#id=7
#text=I then pulled the outer tire off of the inner tube .
#id=8
#text=I replaced the flattened inner tube with the new one and replaced the outer tire over it .
#id=9
#text=I rode off slowly to make sure everything was correctly in place .
#text=Once I got home , I replaced the spare tire kit with a new one so that I would be prepared on my next ride .
